name: Grata Software
tagline: New Product Development On Cloud Based Technology
description:
Grata software is a software consultancy and development firm. We focus on Application development on cloud based services to optimize and automate your business. Leveraging cloud based services like AWS we are able to ensure your software solutions are scalable, mobile, elastic, and fault tolerant.
WE ARE HIRED TO DO THE HARD STUFF
Businesses partner with Grata Software to solve complex problems within the business from architecting an infrastructure for hundreds of thousands of users with multiple terabytes of data to saving failed projects and innovating ideas that have never been thought of before.
